description: Mamdani Fuzzy Inference System for short-term room temperature prediction using SML2010 dataset - Group Project Setup Phase

steps.description: Create main.ipynb with basic imports (numpy, pandas, matplotlib) and load data from data/ folder
Understand and document dataset structure - identify columns and their meanings
Add column names to dataframe based on SML2010 documentation
Basic data cleaning - handle missing values, check data types, remove outliers
Install and import scikit-fuzzy library for fuzzy logic operations
Engineer key features: setpoint error, heat-loss proxy, and HVAC power signal
Define fuzzy input variables and their membership functions (error, heat_loss, hvac_power)
Define fuzzy output variable and membership functions (delta_temp)
Create fuzzy rules (10-15 intuitive rules based on domain knowledge)
Implement fuzzy inference system: fuzzification, rule evaluation, and defuzzification
Create prediction function to compute future temperature T_pred(t+15) = T_current(t) + ΔT_FIS
Implement baseline models: Naïve persistence and Linear regression
Evaluate all models using RMSE, MAE, and comfort range metrics
Create visualizations: predicted vs actual temperature plots, error distributions
Generate final report and comparison summary
